shapes3d.utils
Class VecTransform

java.lang.Object
  shapes3d.utils.VecTransform

public class VecTransform
extends java.lang.Object

Simple class to translate between vector implementations in Processing and Apache commons math library.

Author:
Peter Lager

Constructor Summary
VecTransform()
           
 
Method Summary
static Vector3D p2v(PVector pv)
          Convert P5 vector to maths commons vector.
static PVector v2p(Vector3D v3d)
          Create a new P5 vector from a maths commons vector.
static PVector v2p(Vector3D v3d, PVector pv)
          Modify an existing P5 vector (or create new one if if does not exist) to match the xyz values in a maths commons vector.
